name: Flanger hoax
details:
Flanging phaser modulatorDescription
Electro Harmonix Flanger Hoax is made up of 2 separate phaser sections-the Fixed Phaser and Swept Phaser-and their associated delay lines. The Fixed Phaser is similar to a traditional phaser, modulated by a low-frequency sine wave called the Modulator. Each phaser circuit is followed by its own analog delay line, each of which can also be independently swept by the Modulator. Each phaser section can be bypassed to access the delay lines without any phase shift. Feedback control allows you to send the wet output of the pedal or the output of the Swept Phaser back into the phaser circuits. 18V power supply included.

Pedal flanger/phaser
For guitar, bass or keyboard
5 modulation and delay modes
True bypass
Controls:
Blend
Feedback pot, wet/swpt/off feedback switch
Swept phaser controls: log/linear, amount, modulation mode
Modulator: Rate, delay mode
Fixed phaser: Delay amount, invert switch, bypass switch
Swept phaser: Delay, Bypass
Switch: Effect on/off
LEDs: Status, power
Jacks: Input, direct output, blend output, effect output

https://www.ehx.com/products/flanger-hoax
